text: Jaish e-Mohammed (Urdu: جَيْشِ مُحَمَّدٍؐ) is a militant group active in Kashmir.: "The JEM is a Pakistan-based, militant Islamic group founded by Maulana Masood Azhar in March 2000." The group's goal is to put Indian controlled Kashmir into the control of Pakistan. The group has also been allegedly supported by the Pakistani government in its efforts to take control of Indian controlled Kashmir. == References == Category:Islamist militant groups
title: Jaish-e-Mohammed
